name: Light Of Evil Interlinked - Post GameJam
name_original: Light Of Evil Interlinked - Post GameJam
description:
This is the updated version post game jam of Light of Evil - Interlinked (48hours)https://aletmdec.itch.io/light-of-evil-interlinked

Fixed performance bugs but the gameplay is the same.

- Light switches are bigger

- Interaction distance increased

- Less ray checks

- Slower movement of camera

- Doors will now stay open

Added a Web Version for convenience. The FOG is a little broken in web but everything else is  ok.

Please leave us suggestions so we can make better games!

All comments and critics are welcome!
